channel.title: HTC keyboards
channel.description: [s]hi. i found i very nice finger friendly keyboard with nice decorations. i installed the .CAB and then it told me to restart htc windows mobile. and now i can't seem to find that keyboard :( can somone tell me how i can install this keyboard?[/s] sorry i got it work xD it installed over the old keyboard.... but i need to get another keyboard since it has gone to mini sice and the keyboard is weird..... http://www.freewarepocketpc.net/ppc-download-touch-keyboard-v1-0.html that is original but i got a mini version like everything is in a corner and when i touch it it types anotehr letter :(

item.title: HTC keyboards
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

hi. i found i very nice finger friendly keyboard with nice decorations.
i installed the .CAB and then it told me to restart htc windows mobile.
and now i can’t seem to find that keyboard can somone tell me how i can install this keyboard?
sorry i got it work xD it installed over the old keyboard… but i need to get another keyboard since it has gone to mini sice and the keyboard is weird…
http://www.freewarepocketpc.net/ppc-download-touch-keyboard-v1-0.html
that is original but i got a mini version like everything is in a corner and when i touch it it types anotehr letter
